pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
The seat collision model also got lowered a few cm I think? It still seems to be fairly high for Atlas to properly use the pedals though.

Not related to this pull-request but for the 2.3 roadmap, here's our version of the polaris ranger that we've been using so far which has visually moving steering wheel and wheels, feel free to integrate it with the updated version (so I don't have to do it on our end ;) ): www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/polaris_ranger_ev_drivable.tar.gz

Btw will the pedals stay prismatic joints or are you planning on changing them to use revolute joints (i.e. an arm that is being pushed, like it is with a real pedal)?
